snippet: Human rights groups and the largest opposition party say episodes of intimidation and suppression are growing in the country, an island of stability in an often-chaotic region.
abstract: Pres Obama will arrive in Tanzania to a country where human rights groups and largest opposition party say episodes of intimidation and suppression of political opponents are growing, despite country's reputation as an island of  stability in often-chaotic region of East Africa.
lead_paragraph: Human rights groups and the largest opposition party say episodes of intimidation and suppression are growing in the country, an island of stability in an often-chaotic region.

headline.main: Violent Episodes Grow in Tanzania, an African Haven
headline.print_headline: Violence Grows in Tanzania, A Haven in a Chaotic Region

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
